title: [$$] German Consumer Group Sues Facebook
text:
German Consumer Group Sues Facebook Federation of German Consumer Organizations accuses the social network of making misleading claims and terms of service By freidrich.geiger@wsj.com Updated Oct. 16, 2015 12:43 p.m. ET 
BERLIN—A German consumer group said Friday that it has filed a lawsuit against Facebook Inc., accusing the social network of making misleading claims and terms of service. 
Facebook’s claim that it is free of charge is misleading, argues the Federation of German Consumer Organizations, or VZBV. The group, which is funded in part by the German... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In Popular on WSJ
